title: [Protect and Serve, Wagon Yard]
description: A gold-striped crimson canvas awning, supported by a pair of thin steel poles, stretches from the roof of the wagon, bathing the thick grass in cool shadow.  Several wooden crates are stacked to one side of a small wooden hatch.  At the edge of the yard stands a tiny portable forge with an iron anvil and a low worktable nearby.
